items.q: Which tabletop RPG relies heavily on the 'Powered by the Apocalypse' engine designed by Meguey and Vincent Baker?
items.explanation: Its narrative-focused engine has been adapted into hundreds of other RPGs.

items.q: The objective of the board game 'Betrayal at House on the Hill' remains exactly the same every single time it is played.
items.explanation: The second half of the game 'The Haunt' randomly selects from 50 different betrayal scenarios.

items.q: In the complex card game 'Netrunner', the active player is referred to as the Runner, while the passive player is the Corporation.
items.explanation: Runners try to steal corporate agendas, while Corporations try to score them or flatline the Runner.

items.q: What notoriously brutal early 2000s MMORPG features strict full loot PvP, where a dead player essentially loses everything?
items.explanation: Its sprawling, player-driven economy is famously complex and unforgiving.

items.q: Which highly influential designer spearheaded the creation of 'Sid Meier's Civilization'?
items.explanation: He is widely considered one of the founding fathers of PC strategy games.

items.q: What intense cooperative board game involves playing numbered cards strictly in ascending order without actively communicating?
items.explanation: Players must sync up their internal timing to succeed.

items.q: In chess terminology, what does 'en passant' specifically refer to?
items.a: A special pawn capture that only occurs immediately after a pawn moves two squares from its starting position.
items.explanation: An adjacent enemy pawn can capture it as if it had only moved one square.

items.q: What massively successful 2015 video game focuses strongly on physically building massive factories to perfectly automate production on an alien world?
items.explanation: Players affectionately refer to it as 'Cracktorio' due to its addictive optimization loop.

items.q: Which classic bluffing tabletop game requires players to hold two hidden role cards, fundamentally allowing them to assassinate or steal from opponents?
items.explanation: You can claim to have any role card, but you lose an influence if someone calls your bluff.

items.q: What highly acclaimed 2019 action game tasks players with creatively defeating heavily armed enemies using a prosthetic arm in Sengoku-era Japan?
items.explanation: It won Game of the Year specifically for its brutally tight parry combat system.
